bio:
Redwater Lookout is a woman guarding the trapdoor entrance down into Redwater Den. Redwater Den is an underground cave system located in a remote hilly area in the northern section of the Rift. Inside Redwater Den, this lookout's employers sell a special variety of skooma (an illegal narcotic drug) called Redwater skooma.
A man is helping this woman guard the trapdoor entrance, which is surrounded by a half-destroyed abanoned old house. She is an archer, and carries a bow and arrows. She often sits on a stump in front of the fireplace, near the trapdoor. This female lookout and her male companion lookout are secretly thralls of a vampire, who currently resides deep within Redwater Den. These lookouts will not admit to being enthralled by a vampire.
Quotes:
"You here for the Skooma? Head around inside, there's a trap door that'll lead you in."
"Look, I'm just here to keep watch. What you're looking for is down inside."
"If you're here for business, go ahead. Otherwise, get lost."
name: Redwater Lookout
